description.value:
Options:

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.YSIHeQlc1iYijLSb]{Against the Odds}

    When you make a D20 Test at Disadvantage, you instead make it normally. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.vER9H5t8h2RDIMHM]{Alert}

    You cannot have Disadvantage on Initiative rolls unless you have the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.igIqLtAshT6oe64Y]{Ambition}

    If you roll two or more D20s as part of a D20 Test and you get the same result on two, you gain a Heroic Inspiration. You cannot use this feature again until you finish a Long Rest.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.blGW5xx3MNg6X6YD]{Exergy}

    If you roll two or more D20s as part of a D20 Test and you get the same result on two, you may consider the result a natural 20.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.qACt8c0gnfDUqjYW]{Expedient}

    When take an action to end a condition or other effect (at your DM's discretion) on you or another creature, you can instead use your Bonus Action.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.N5VqJh82RL8Xd09f]{Eye-Catching}

    When you take the Help action to Assist an Attack Roll by distracting an enemy, you can choose to distract any number of additional creatures within 5 feet of the target.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.v8RRqgpTYurElm1u]{Favorable Outcomes}

    When you add the results of additional dice to a D20 Test (such as having Guidance or benefiting from Bardic Inspiration), you roll them twice and take the better result.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.nHRWWuNWhtS3OodB]{Multithreaded}

    If the option of multiple skill checks are available for the same moment, and you may use your Proficiency Bonus with at least two of the options, you make the skill check at Advantage.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.CXudNusEHG3Bblsu]{Multithreaded 2}

    If the option of multiple skill checks are available for the same moment, and you may use your Proficiency Bonus with at least two of the options, you make the skill check at Advantage and add your Proficiency Bonus to the result.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.71P8dQCsZssi3Ej4]{Patient Poise}

    When you take the Ready action, you gain the benefits from the Dodge action until the triggering circumstance occurs or the start of your next turn.

  • @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.feats.Item.Twacn75idrm9PLSx]{Raw Will}

    When you make an ability check, you can add your Constitution modifier to the roll. You must choose to do so before the roll. You cam use this feature a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.
